CarePgmEnrolleeWkOrdStep.name: CarePgmEnrolleeWkOrdStep
CarePgmEnrolleeWkOrdStep.description: Represents information about the step in a work order that's executed for the care program enrollee.

ActionPlanTemplateId.description: Represents the action plan template containing the tasks related to each work order step.

AreAllTasksCompleted.description: Determine whether all the child tasks for the step are completed (true) or not (false).

EndDateTime.description: Represents the end date and time for the execution of the work order step.

IsCustodyCompleted.description: Determine whether all the custody chain entries for the step and the related tasks are completed (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced the record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed the record.

Name.description: Represents the name of the step associated with the care program enrollee work order record.

ParentEnrolleeWorkOrderId.description: Represents the parent work order of the care program enrollee that's associated with the step.

SequenceNumber.description: Represents the sequence in which the work order step will be executed.

StartDateTime.description: Represents the start date and time for the execution of the work order step.

Status.description: Specifies the execution status of the work order step.

WorkTypeStepId.description: The work type step for which the work order step of the care program enrollee is created.
